wikipedia_page.main: Peter Guidi (14 September 1949 – 17 April 2018) was a jazz saxophonist and jazz flutist whose main instruments were the flute, alto and bass flute, alto and soprano saxophones.

response: * 14 – Peter Guidi, Scottish saxophonist and flutist (died 2018).
